speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but I don't appreciate these calls. What do you want?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. I'm calling about your overdue account with ABC Services.

speaker: Customer
text: I've told you before to stop calling me. I want my number on the do not call list!

speaker: Agent
text: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Let me assist you with that right away.

speaker: Customer
text: Please make sure it's done. I don't want to hear from you again.

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you, I will mark your number as do not call immediately.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you. I hope this time it works.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome. Your number is now on the do not call list.
